paragons.name: 01 (The World Tree)
paragons.advantage: If a follower of 01 has at least one mark on a target, they may act as if they have an extra mark on it.
paragons.disadvantage: –1 limit and –1 dice pool penalty when acting only in AR.

paragons.name: Architect
paragons.advantage: +1 limit and +1 dice pool bonus for Edit actions.
paragons.disadvantage: –1 limit and –1 dice for Snoop actions.

paragons.name: Archivist (The Record Keeper)
paragons.advantage: +1 limit and +1 dice pool bonus for Browse actions and digital legwork.
paragons.disadvantage: –1 limit for Edit actions designed to destroy data.

paragons.name: Black Hat (The Cracker)
paragons.advantage: +2 limit for gaining marks on a target.
paragons.disadvantage: -1 limit and –1 die when setting a Data Bomb.

paragons.name: Daedalus (The Inventor)
paragons.advantage: +1 dice pool bonus for Hardware tests, +1 limit on Pilot skill tests when jumped in.
paragons.disadvantage: –1 dice and limit for all actions in the Deep Resonance.

paragons.name: Delphi (The Oracle)
paragons.advantage: +1 bonus to dice pool and limit when threading complex forms.
paragons.disadvantage: –2 modifier to the technomancer's Initiative Score.

paragons.name: Intrusion Countermeasure (The Guardian)
paragons.advantage: +1 bonus to dice pool and limit in cybercombat, +1 to firewall.
paragons.disadvantage: –1 dice pool penalty when attacking IC in cybercombat.

paragons.name: Probe (The Scout)
paragons.advantage: +2 dice pool bonus and +1 limit on all actions when directly connected to an isolated system.
paragons.disadvantage: –1 limit penalty when logged into more than one grid.

paragons.name: Shooter (The Soldier)
paragons.advantage: +1 bonus to dice pool and limit in cybercombat, +1 limit to all attack actions (physical and Matrix)
paragons.disadvantage: –2 dice pool penalty and –1 limit when compiling sprites.
